item.title: By: A. E. Ash
item.dc:creator: A. E. Ash
item.description: "I think that’s why the term bothers me so much—it’s gendered, utterly, and wielded by all against beginning writers and roleplayers. Worse, other creatives are lambasting younger female writers, artists, and roleplayers — silencing them before they have a chance to grow." YASSSSSSS. GAH. Such a fantastic article, Lenair...if it had not been for RP writing, I'd not be writing fiction at all so yeah. Important post!
